titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain real property adjacent to the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site in Greeneville, Tennessee, for inclusion with the national cemetery located in that Site.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 5/21/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation specified lands in Greene County, Tennessee, for inclusion within the national cemetery in the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site, Greeneville, Tennessee.
